com.example.mooderation.backend

Class MoodEventRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mooderation.backend.MoodEventRepository

  • public class MoodEventRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Database abstraction for accessing a user's mood events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      MoodEventRepository()
      Default constructor.
      MoodEventRepository(FirebaseUser user, FirebaseFirestore firestore)
      Constructor used for testing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoodEventRepository

        public MoodEventRepository()
        Default constructor. Creates dependencies internally.

      • MoodEventRepository

        public MoodEventRepository(FirebaseUser user,
                           FirebaseFirestore firestore)
        Constructor used for testing. Supports dependency injection.
        Parameters:
        user - The user whose mood history will be tracked.
        firestore - The current database instance.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public <any> add(MoodEvent moodEvent)
        Add a mood event to the user's mood history. Will overwrite a mood event with the same Date.
        Parameters:
        moodEvent - The mood event to be added.
        Returns:
        Database operation Task, used for testing.

      • remove

        public <any> remove(MoodEvent moodEvent)
        Remove a mood event from the user's mood history
        Parameters:
        moodEvent - The mood event to remove.
        Returns:
        Database operation Task, used for testing.

      • getMoodHistory

        public <any> getMoodHistory()
        Get the current user's mood history. Sorted in reverse chronological order.
        Returns:
        LiveData tracking the user's mood history.
